creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: abstracted female figure clutching white object patterned with ribbon, swirl motif, obscuring most of body; skeletal fingers in dark blue visible through the white motif; face has shadowy, indistinct features; overall pallet of purples and white; purple background with blue swaths along lower edge, orange lines; white frame
medium: Oil-based printing ink and oil bar on canvas
signed: signed, dated in brown pigment, LRC: Portia Zvavahera \'17
title: Urkindifuratira (You Turned Your Back on Me)
